question: If you could go back in time, what time period would you go to?
Describe your perfect morning?
What are three things you love about yourself?
What is something you would love to do as a couple?
What is something your partner did recently that you are grateful for?
What is something on your bucket list?
What do you think works well about our relationship?

Would you like to be famous? If so, in what way?
What would constitute an awesome night for you?
If you could change anything about the way you were raised, what would it be?
What is the greatest accomplishment of your life?
What do you value most in a friendship?
What is your most treasured memory?
What is your most terrible memory?
What is something you would like to do together that we have never done before?
When did you know you were in love with me?
What are three qualities about me that you were first attracted to?
What was your favorite date that we ever had? What made it so special for you?
Do you have a favorite adventure that we took together? What made it your favorite?

What is the best gift you have ever received?
What is the worst gift you have ever received, and what did you do about it?

How do you de-stress?
What is your favorite holiday?
What is your go-to karaoke song?
What is one of your go-to songs to listen to while driving?
Which Hogwarts house would you be in and why?
Do you think it is ok to pee in the shower?
What is the most illegal or risky thing you did growing up?
What do you remember thinking to yourself the first time you saw me?
